initiatives.title: Our ACTIVE initiatives
initiatives.casatutti.title: The House of All
initiatives.casatutti.description:
It was born from an idea by Yacine and Aliou, two members of the SUNUGAL association, with the aim of creating a space for listening and guidance towards citizenship, in order to promote social inclusion and interculturality.

The help desk aims to offer a space at the CIQ in Milan where no one is a stranger and where it will be possible to receive legal, tax, linguistic, and migration-related assistance.

Thanks to the contribution of Leonardo, CAT, and the help of Mary and Luis from CONCAF, who specialize in tax consulting, it will be possible to receive guidance in the field of taxation (tax returns, VAT number opening, patronage services, CAF, etc.).
initiatives.calcio.title: Street football
initiatives.calcio.description:
The Amateur Sports Association BOCA DEL POZO MILANO has been active for over ten years in the province of Milan, promoting sports and cultural activities for children. Founded by supporters of Club Sport Emelec (Ecuador), it involves volunteers from all over Latin America and Italy, united by a passion for sports and social commitment.

Goal
We enhance public spaces through sports and culture, believing that football and music foster inclusion, growth, and socialization.

"Street Football" Project
Launched in Quarto Oggiaro and later moved to San Siro, the project offers grassroots football to children aged 6 to 13, thanks to volunteers and materials provided by the association.
